<h1 align="center">
  Handsign - ASL Hand Gesture Detection Using TensorFlow
</h1>

Handsign is a simple AI based hand gesture recognition to translate it into American Sign Language (ASL) alphabet. Using Tensorflow JS and its Handpose preloaded model to detect the hand object and its parts. Handsign also using an additional library called Fingerpose to detect certain of hand gesture based on the finger position. 

![Handsign demo](https://media.giphy.com/media/vS0kSOyXLkv8bFiIJk/giphy.gif)
